CustomField.description: To count days left until DD
CustomField.formula: IF( NOT(ISBLANK(pre_tour_stopover__c)), departure_date__c - Sub_Stop_over_nights_date__c, IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(AE_Nights__c)), AE_Nights__c > 0 ), True_departure_date_from_AE_nights__c -TODAY(), departure_date__c - TODAY() ) ) - IF(day_zero_departure__c, 1, 0)
CustomField.label: Days until Departure Date
